desc: Ricardo Ferro is a dynamic Importer & Retailer of Italian/European Women's Designer Shoes, Handbags & Leather Jackets. Our collections consist of "affordable" brands that match or better the quality and sophistication of other luxury brands whilst creating a great "Customer Service Experience".

layout.text: Ricardo Ferro is a dynamic Importer & Retailer of Italian/European Women's Designer Shoes, Handbags & Leather Jackets. Our collections consist of "affordable" brands that match or better the quality and sophistication of other luxury brands with our emphasis being on providing a great "Customer Experience".
